pageTitle: Burnley - Just the Ticket-QPR at Loftus Road!
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {10256=Dyche Sets Long Short Term Goals (Wednesday July 29 2015), 10059=Fleetwood Win Pleases Dyche (Wednesday July 29 2015), 11228=Darikwa Completes Clarets Move (Friday July 31 2015), 10457=Agyei Signs On - Jones Extends Deal (Wednesday July 29 2015), 18733=Time: 9:37PM, 10657=Villa Defender To Replace Shackell? (Wednesday July 29 2015), 18777=Date:Monday January 6 2014, 10841=Trip To Ewood On TV (Thursday July 30 2015), 22431=Burnley travel to Loftus Road on Saturday, 1st February to play QPR and fans are reminded that this game kicks-off early at 12:15 pm due to live coverage by Sky Sports. The club has been allocated 1750 tickets for this game, which are now available to Season Ticket & Flexi Ticket holders and shareholders, priced as follows: Ticket are available in person, online and on the phone on 0871 221 19114 (opt 2). Gold tickets (Upper tier): Adults: £30 Over 60: £20 16-21: £20 (proof of age required) U16: £15 Silver tickets (Upper tier): Adults: £25 Over 60: £15 16-21: £15 (proof of age required) U16: £12 The following will be sold on completion of the above tickets: Gold tickets (Upper tier - restricted view*): Adults: £28 Over 60: £19 16-21: £19 (proof of age required) U16: £14 Silver tickets (Upper tier - restricted view*): Adults: £23 Over 60: £14 16-21: £14 (proof of age required) U16: £11 U8 (accompanied by adult): FREE (prior to matchday). *Restricted view means there is a stanchion in view of one of the goals. Remaining tickets will go on general sale on Monday, January 13., 9866=Nothing Short About Long Deal (Tuesday July 28 2015), 11035=Shrewsbury Reject Ginnelly Bid (Thursday July 30 2015), 9478=Friendly - Chesterfield 3-2 Burnley (Saturday July 25 2015), 9674=Cisak Seals Leyton Orient Switch (Tuesday July 28 2015)}
